name: Amazonia
description:
Embrace the journey of  this challenging  run & gun game about a native trying to help a water spirit to put out the fires of the Amazon rainforest. Extinguish the fire monsters responsible of such tragedy by shooting them in the face while you listen to some groovy beats.

This game was made for the Community Game Jam in five days.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys - Move | Aim
  • Spacebar - Jump | Double Jump
  • X - Shoot.
  • Z - Dash.

Assets

Unless listed below, all the assets were made during the jam.

  • Anima2D  - Used for some skeletal animations.
  • Cinemachine - Really nice to work with.
  • TextMeshPro - Clean and crisp pieces of text.
  • OMG Write Like William - Font obtained from DaFont. Public Domain Licence.

Creation Specifics

Not sure if anyone wants to know these, buuuuuut:

  • Unity3D - Game Engine.
  • LMMS Studio - Music composition and sound effect creation.
  • Audacity - Sound effect creation and edition.
  • Krita - Graphic elements.
